author: Staff Reporter
text: Wife of Devadoss, a person accused in several murder cases, has complained against police inspector, Palani, for demanding Rs.5 lakh for not arresting her husband. An audio regarding this has gone viral in whatsapp a few days ago in which Palani was purportedly seen demanding money from the advocate of Devadoss. Following this, Palani was transferred to Vellore district. At this juncture, Savithri has petitioned the SP, R.Ponni that her husband has gone incommunicado as he was threatened by the inspector to give money.
title: Wife of accused complains against Inspector
